Package xxl.core.spatial.predicates

Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, Within (Euclidean distance), etc .

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ContainsPredicate A predicate that returns true if object0 contains object1.
DimOverlapPredicate A predicate that returns true if two Rectangles overlap in a user-specified dimension.
DistanceWithinEuclidean A distance predicate based on the euclidean distance-measure (This distance-measure corresponds to the L_2-metric).
DistanceWithinMaximum<P extends Point> A distance predicate based on the euclidean distance-measure (This distance-measure corresponds to the L_infinity-metric).
OverlapsPredicate A predicate that returns true if object0 overlaps object1.
UnitCubeConstraint The UnitCubeConstraint-predicate checks if the argument (which is assumed to be a Point) is inside the unit-cube [0;1)^dim.
 

Package xxl.core.spatial.predicates Description

Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, Within (Euclidean distance), etc .
